name: Gleaming the KubeCon with Solomon Hykes, Tammer Saleh, James McShane, Steve Francis & Spencer Smith @ KubeCon 2023 (Changelog Interviews #568)
summary: This week we’re gleaming the KubeCon. Ok, some people say CubeCon, while others say KubeCon…we talk with Solomon Hykes about all things Dagger, Tammer Saleh and James McShane about going beyond cloud native with SuperOrbital, and Steve Francis and Spencer Smith about the state of Talos Linux and what they’re working on...
